title: How do i see my account recovery support ticket?
body:
I sent a support ticket in regards to having trouble accessing my account and went through the whole process of submitting all the required information. I received the confirmation email but when I click the link to view the ticket it redirects me to the login page. I wasn't signed into any account prior to making this ticket nor did I create a recovery account specific to this issue. . And now, as i try to view the ticket with my smurf account logged in, it redirects me to an oops page. Any ideas to how I can review the ticket?

Screenshot of error message: https://gyazo.com/ad2a4410bcca0dbf47fc188638663777

replies.body:
You can't login to view your ticket since you're trying to recover your account. Account recovery tickets are handled entirely via email (from your side).

Let me know if you have any questions.
So my response will come via email?
That's correct. Check your spam/filtered inbox folders to ensure it doesn't land in there!

But my problem is my brother's email is locked and cannot be accessed, and I see that since I submitted my ticket the guy who bought my brother's account from the hacker has not logged on since. So what happens from here.
